mapper.insert: insert into comment(symbol, writer, comment) values (#{symbol}, #{writer}, #{comment})
mapper.update: update comment set t_up = t_up + #{num} where cNum = #{cNum}
mapper.select: select count(likeNum) from liked where writer = #{writer} and cNum = #{cNum}
mapper.delete: delete from liked where cNum = #{cNum} and writer = #{writer}
